name: TheAtlantic
text: Vladimir Putin's own version of his origins leaves far too much out. A new book tells the true story of how KGB methods, tactics, and operations have fueled Russia’s quest for glory, @anneapplebaum writes. https://t.co/9WEIUykrKW

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Many of us are now riddled with anxiety over whether we’ll send our kids back to school, even part-time, or keep them home," @russell_nm writes: https://t.co/kp5Fm0LxqH

name: TheAtlantic
text: Walt Disney World has reopened and @gcaw spent a weekend riding rides, waving at princesses, and contemplating his mortality. https://t.co/vxbVHmLeTr

name: TheAtlantic
text: Being married seems to make the pandemic more bearable. But the coronavirus could make getting married even harder for millions of Americans, @EmilyBobrow writes: https://t.co/yvGd7iZFMu

name: TheAtlantic
text: "The modern rise of American craft brewing has been a genuine success story of entrepreneurship, localism, constructive business creativity, and in many places, of civic renewal." @JamesFallows on how craft brewing will survive the pandemic: https://t.co/4B6YUOwKoP

name: TheAtlantic
text: The latest episode of the Social Distance podcast features our staff writer, Graeme Wood, making his first visit to Walt Disney World in the midst of the pandemic: https://t.co/TSv19FJe6g

name: TheAtlantic
text: Temper your expectations around a coronavirus vaccine. And be wary of “hygiene theater,” or risk-reduction practices that do little to reduce risk. The latest Atlantic Daily, by @mimbsy: https://t.co/Wn7IjvMx4z

name: TheAtlantic
text: "Barr is using the most intrusive and offensive tools he can command simply to extend his and the president’s tenure in office into a second term," writes Donald Ayer, former U.S. Deputy Attorney General under George H. W. Bush: https://t.co/tJYLdHX9b8

name: TheAtlantic
text: RT @jaynordlinger: By @anneapplebaum, a learned, fascinating review, on a highly important topic. https://t.co/X8QSiG17VV

text: RT @davidfrum: ICYMI my article about the experience of crossing from USA to Canada into pandemic. https://t.co/HFmWc6vkS1

name: TheAtlantic
text: “As much as he loved oil and canvas, his true resonance is with the screen. To this day, millions of people gaze at the videos he made and feel a deep emotional connection to them.” @MooneyMichaelJ explores Bob Ross’s enduring popularity: https://t.co/sLFVZPzBeq

name: TheAtlantic
text: "What fundamentally unites the Biden coalition is the demand for decent and competent government. If Biden can display these traits, it is possible that both the left and the right might consider him a success," @qjurecic and @benjaminwittes write: https://t.co/ju3XQ63IYn

name: TheAtlantic
text: Children who have experienced abuse or dysfunction often have difficulty learning—but an Oklahoma teacher named Heather Boyle knows how to work with them. @laura11D reports: https://t.co/vPyGnyKiBj
